item.title: Mode
item.description: What is it? R Base R Rcpp Blueprint Templated Python Pure Python NumPy Numba Parallel CuPy Shootout Environment This post was last updated on 2018-11-30. What is it? Given a sequence, the mode is the value with the highest number of occurrences. Steps find the unique values count the number of occurrences of each value the mode is the value with the highest number of occurrences R Base R r_mode <- function(x) { uniques <- x[!

item.title: Median
item.description: What is it? R Base R Custom Base R Rcpp Sugar Custom Blueprint Templated Python Pure Python NumPy Numba Parallel CuPy Shootout Environment What is it? Given a sequence, which is the middle-most value. Put another way, what value is equally likely to be greater than the first half of a sorted sequence and lesser than the second half of a sorted sequence.
